name: Big Booty Barbarians
description:
A short and sweet Action 2D platformer created for the 4th Vaultacular Game Jam.

Theme: Dont forget about the final boss

Limitation: Three heroes

Timeframe: March 31 - April 18 2022

The year is 20XX the world has been ravaged by war, floods, aliens and basically every other disaster. Humankind has reverted to a tribal state living in small clans. In these dark times a new evil raises Doctor E. Will has kidnapped princess Applepiecrust and its up to the three Big Booty Barbarians to rescue her.
